hero.title: Modern SaaS Platform for Scalable Applications
hero.subtitle: Build, deploy, and scale your SaaS applications with BoxLog.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern SaaS
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build and scale your SaaS application
features.headline: Everything you need to scale your business
features.description: From powerful APIs to advanced analytics, BoxLog provides all the tools you need to build, deploy, and scale your applications with confidence.

grid.title: Powerful features for modern teams
grid.subtitle: Everything you need to build, deploy, and scale your applications in one integrated platform.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Connect with 100+ third-party services and build custom integrations with our powerful REST API.

realTimeAnalytics.title: Real-time Analytics
realTimeAnalytics.description: Get detailed insights into your application performance with comprehensive analytics and reporting.

advancedSecurity.title: Advanced Security
advancedSecurity.description: Enterprise-grade security with SSL encryption, two-factor authentication, and compliance certifications.

workflowAutomation.title: Workflow Automation
workflowAutomation.description: Streamline your processes with powerful automation tools and custom workflow builders.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Work together seamlessly with real-time collaboration, comments, and team management features.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobileOptimized.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission, team, and values. We create technology that empowers everyone to build a better future.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: BoxLog is an innovative SaaS platform that supports corporate growth through the power of technology. Our mission is to realize a world where everyone can create a better future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that technology should be accessible, powerful, and intuitive. Our mission is to create tools that empower businesses to innovate, grow, and succeed in the digital age.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A World Where Everyone Can Create
vision.description: We envision a future where advanced technology is within everyone's reach, enabling individuals and organizations to build solutions that make a positive impact on the world.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These values guide our decision-making and actions

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Our customers' success is our success. We always develop products and provide services from the customer's perspective.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continue to follow the latest technology trends and provide innovative solutions that lead the industry.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We value open and transparent communication and build trust relationships.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We continuously improve and learn to provide high-quality products and services.

cta.title: Let's Create the Future Together
cta.description: Unlock your business potential with our platform. Start today and take the first step toward digital transformation.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

hero.title: Simple, transparent pricing
hero.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your team. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
hero.description: Start free, scale as you grow. Cancel anytime.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects

trial.title: 14-day free trial
trial.description: No credit card required to get started

security.title: Secure & compliant

support.title: 24/7 support
support.description: Expert support when you need it most

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join thousands of teams who trust our platform to scale their business. Start your free trial today.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Our expert team will respond quickly.

form.title: Contact Us
form.subtitle: If you have any questions or inquiries, please feel free to contact us. Our expert staff will respond promptly.
